Limit the maximum CPU performance to conserve battery life and lower device temperature..
Step 1: Input a phone number (no need to add international access code and country code), click the call button, then the eSurfing dialing dialogue will pop up automatically.
Step 2: When to dial a phone in China mainland, select ‘International call’ under ‘Dial to China mainland’, the ‘+86’ prefix will be added automatically.
Step 2: When to dial a phone in Macau, select ‘International call’ under ‘Dial to Macau’, the ‘+853’ prefix will be added automatically.
Step 2: When to dial a phone in Hongkong, select ‘International call’ under ‘Dial to Hongkong’, the ‘+852’ prefix will be added automatically.
Step 2: When to dial a phone in Taiwan, select ‘International call’ under ‘Dial to Taiwan’, the ‘+886’ prefix will be added automatically.
Step 2: When to dial a phone in home country, select ‘International call’ under ‘Dial to home country’, the international dialing prefix will be added automatically.

Step 2: When the SIM card is a China mainland SIM card, and when to dial a phone in China mainland, you can also select ‘**133 call back’ under ‘Dial to China mainland’, the ‘**133’ prefix will be added automatically.

Step 2: When to dial a phone in other countries or territories, select ‘Dial to another country’ and the list of countries and territories will pop up. Select your target country or territory and return back to eSurfing dialing dialogue. The international roaming prefix will be added automatically.
Step 2: When to dial a local phone, select ‘Local call’. The inputted number will be dialed out directly without change.
4G provides better and faster internet services.
Cannot use call and message during 4G data only mode.
Cannot use this feature due to the 4G data only mode. Would you like to exit 4G data only mode?
No 4G data only network available in your current location. Would you like to exit and search for other networks?
It is detected that your SIM card is not compatible with the device. Please use CT 4G UIM card
Please insert a China Telecom UIM Card
You are about to enable 4G. The current network service will be stopped while searching for LTE network. Would you like to continue?
